resources.string:
v2.6

* Synced and built as of 8-11-2012

* Updated build fingerprint to JRO03L

* Updated kernel to Popcorn 11.6

* Fixed the toggles layout previews to relflect no swagger

* Updated build id to JRO03L

* Added in fully functional cron service

* Added new nice tweaks

* Tweaked the dalvik system (in testing)

* Added About Steel Droid section in Settings

* Fixed adb remount command

* Removed Unlink Volumes option for now

Hey, I'm ChevyCam94!

I bring you the Steel Droid linup of custom ROMs.

When I first started working on Android, I was only doing battery icon sets. They gave me the insight as to how Android was structured. Being a life-long computer tech/nerd, I decided to try to see how far I could stretch my skills.

I built my first ROM for the Droid 1, off of a leak. Just added some stuff and removed others. After a few months of playing around, I learned of GITHUB, and how to build from source. I found out how much easier that was for me, and have built from source every chance I get since then. That was only 2 years ago. Now Im building Jellybean, making my own themes, and helping others benefit from some of my work. Im still learning a lot, thanks to those that have given me advice, sometimes for hours at a time.

The final result?

! STEEL DROID !
